title: Request an External Contractor for a Repair
description: A specialized piece of equipment has broken down and requires a certified technician from the OEM to repair it.

tasks.description: Identify the approved service provider for the specific piece of equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the OEM's service contact information in the supplier database.

tasks.description: Create a service request detailing the issue and the asset that needs repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a formal service request.

tasks.description: Send the service request to the external contractor and await a proposed appointment time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully dispatches the service request.
